skills.title: Front-End
skills.description: Skilled in React.js, HTML, CSS, and Next.js, crafting seamless and visually engaging frontend experiences.

skills.title: Back-End

skills.title: Block-chain

portfolio.title: BlockVault

portfolio.title: Pro-Pay

portfolio.title: Inventory Management
